name: Git Manager
description: Initialize repos, commit changes, and push to GitHub. Supports creating new GitHub repos automatically.

secrets.description: Token with repo scope for creating repos and pushing code
secrets.label: GitHub Personal Access Token
secrets.name: GITHUB_TOKEN

inputs.name: action
inputs.description: Action to perform: init, commit, push, create-repo, status

inputs.name: repo_name
inputs.description: GitHub repository name (for 'create-repo' or 'push' to new repo)

inputs.name: private
inputs.description: Make the GitHub repo private (default: false, creates public repo)
